void setVirtualKeyboardController(VirtualKeyboardController) Sets the instance of VirtualKeyboardController to use for virtual keyboard management, or null for none.
ValueView<Boolean> virtualKeyboardActive() A value indicating whether the virtual keyboard is currently active or not (if the platform has one).

void clearFocus() Clears the currently focused field, if any.
ImageOverlay createImageOverlay(Image)  
ValueView<Field> focus() Gets a view of the Field that is currently in focus.
void hideNativeOverlays(IRectangle) Hides the native widgets under the given screen area, using platform clipping if supported.
SignalView<Void> keyboardActivity() Signal emitted when the user interacts with a native text field.
NativeTextField refresh(NativeTextField) Refreshes a native text field to match the current styles of its associated field instance.
void refreshNativeBounds() Updates the bounds of all known native fields.
void setKeyboardFocusController(KeyboardFocusController) Sets the instance of KeyboardFocusController to use for keyboard focus management, or null for none.

Changed from abstract to non-abstract. 		Creates a native text field, if this platform supports it.
